flawed_nl_solution:
Gilbert planted 3 + 1 + 2 = <<3+1+2=10>>10 herb plants.
He gained a basil plant when one of the basil plants seeded a new plant, so he had 10 + 1 = <<10+1=11>>11 plants.
The rabbit ate both mint plants, so Gilbert had 11 - 2 = <<11-2=9>>9 herb plants when spring ended.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
